name: Walrus Contact Time
description:
Were you too fucking stupid to identify objects? Do you still want to become a real walrus? Walrus Contact Time has got you covered! Search through a sea of over 300 objects to find your walrus bretherin in five different rounds with randomized objects and walrus positions! Too many objects on the screen? Don't worry, you dumb fuck! Walrus Contact Time comes with three different difficulty options with less objects the lower you go! With only one way to play and no extras, do you have what it takes?

Credits

  • KamilFirma - The OST
  • Rawkit - The descriptions
  • Background images - Toba Aquarium
  • The rest of the images - Still not me don't sue me i beg you
